Siempre usar camelCase.
El repo trata de una API para un dashboard de analitica.

Frameworks y librerias usadas:
- FastAPI
- Pydantic
- MongoDB
- pydantic-settings
- Sentry
- Pydantic-Mongo https://pydantic-mongo.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html
- FastAPI-guard https://rennf93.github.io/fastapi-guard/sitemap.xml
- - https://rennf93.github.io/fastapi-guard/latest/installation/
- - https://rennf93.github.io/fastapi-guard/latest/api/overview/
- - https://rennf93.github.io/fastapi-guard/latest/tutorial/configuration/security-config/
- - https://rennf93.github.io/fastapi-guard/latest/tutorial/decorators/access-control/

Adicional:
- Seguridad https://curity.io/resources/api-security/
- - https://curity.io/resources/learn/api-security-best-practices
- - https://curity.io/resources/learn/the-api-security-maturity-model/
- - https://curity.io/resources/learn/the-api-security-maturity-model/
- - https://curity.io/resources/learn/jwt-best-practices/
- - https://curity.io/resources/learn/owasp-top-ten/
